name: Nero Backup File
summary: Learn about .NDA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To make a backup of your data, BackItUp and Burn creates multiple NDA files to store the data. You can only restore the file by using Nero's backup software.

description: Backup file created by BackItUp (formerly BackItUp and Burn), a program that allows users to compress and back up files; contains encrypted backup data of your files, folders, applications, or drives.
